resources.string:
Terms and definitions:

Site - yaplakal.com web portal.
Application - YapTalker application for Android OS devices.
Content - text, pictures and videos published on the Site and displayed with the Application.
User - individual who has joined this Agreement and who accesses the Site Content using a mobile device.
Developer - author of the Application.
Agreement - this agreement with all additions and annexes.

General rules:

1. By installing the Application User automatically confirms that he fully agrees with the terms of this Agreement.

2. The Developer is not responsible for the user Content published on the Site and displayed in the Application.

3. The Developer do not claim any rights to the materials published on the Site and displayed in the Application.

4. The Developer reserves the right to collect anonymous usage statistics for the Application.

5. The Agreement (including any of its parts) can be changed by the Developer without any special notification. The new version of the Agreement comes into force from the moment of its publication in the Application.

If you do not agree to the terms of this Agreement, you should immediately uninstall the Application.
